Name: Pineapple Fix
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Rum and pineapple are a match made in heaven, here with lemon adding citrus freshness.
Nutrition: One serving of Pineapple Fix contains 239 calories
